SA11sanss06u:8_0: sati satvârthe yad aṅgam anupayogi tad dṛḍhatarasmṛtyapekṣāniścalamādhyachandaparâpattīkṛtaṃ sarvadhīraceṣṭāsmṛtiḥ /
SA11sanss06u:13_0: yaḥ śrotā vaktavyaḥ sa yāvanmātreṇa dhvaninârthaṃ jānāti /
SA11sanss06u:26_0: ayaṃ câdaraḥ śamathamāhātmyaṃ jñātvā tātparyeṇa jāyate /
SA11sanss06u:32_0: anunnahanatâcapalatâcañcalatā saumyatā guptatā karmaṇyatâjāneyatâikâgratâikârāmatā saṃgaṇikāvarjanatā vivekaratiḥ kāyavivekaś cittâvibhramo 'raṇyamukhamanasikāratâlpêcchatā /
SA11sanss06u:33_0: yāvad īryāpathaguptiḥ kālajñatā samayajñatā mātrajñatā muktijñatā /
SA11sanss06u:35_0: kiṃ punar asya śamasya māhātmyaṃ yathābhūtajñānajananaśaktiḥ /
SA11sanss06u:36_0: yasmāt samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātîty avadan muniḥ //
SA11sanss06u:41_0: idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśanaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niṣpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:42_0: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣāṃ paripūryāṃ caturāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate /
SA11sanss06u:44_0: idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cânantâpāyâdiduḥkhasamatikramânanta laukikalokôttarasukhasaṃpatprakarṣapāraprāptyātmakam avagamya tadabhilāṣeṇâtāpo bhāvayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:50_0: yaś ca niṣphalaṃ varjayati tasyânarthā na saṃbhava-
SA11sanss06u:53_0: tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyaṃ //
SA11sanss06u:58_0: yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati /
SA11sanss06u:59_0: yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti /
SA11sanss06u:60_0: yayā smṛtyôtpathe vā kumārge vā na patati /
SA11sanss06u:61_0: yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dadātîyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti /
SA11sanss06u:67_0: yathā yathā câsyaḥ [[DOUBT]] kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathâiva prajānāti //
SA11sanss06u:69_0: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavati /
SA11sanss06u:71_0: aśite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tuṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavatîti /
SA11sanss06u:77_0: ato 'vagamyate ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogās te śīlântargatêti /
SA11sanss06u:81_0: tathā śīlârthinâpi samādhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ tatrâiva sūtre vacanāt /
SA11sanss06u:87_0: etābhyāṃ ca śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhanakarābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ etāvatī cêyaṃ bodhisatvaśikṣā yad uta cittaparikarma /
SA11sanss06u:93_0: cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
SA11sanss06u:94_0: cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vâśubham //
SA11sanss06u:100_0: sâivaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sûpasthitasmṛtir viharati na cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanss06u:101_0: ap tu cittam evâsya vaśaṃ gacchati /
SA11sanss06u:104_0_0: yo 'yaṃ dharmo dharmêty ucyate nâyaṃ dharmo deśastho*na pradeśastho 'nyatra svacittâdhīno dharmaḥ tasmān mayā svacittaṃ svārādhitaṃ
SA11sanss06u:108_0: tatra bodhisatvo*doṣebhyaś cittaṃ nivārya guṇeṣu pravartayati //
SA11sanss06u:111_0: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samādānaḥ sukhâbhisaṃbodhāya saṃvartatae iti //
SA11sanss06u:122_0: tathâtrâiva māyādevy-adarśanâkulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyās taddarśanârtham iyam anuśāsanī /
SA11sanss06u:131_0: cittanagarapraticchādanaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ vipuladharmacchatrasarvâkuśala dharmapratipakṣâbhinirharaṇatayā /
SA11sanss06u:132_0: cittanagaravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ ādhyātmikabāhyavastu sarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā /
SA11sanss06u:134_0: yāvad evaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhyabhiyuktena kulaputra bodhisatvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūla samārjanam anuprāptuṃ /
SA11sanss06u:143_0: śamāc ca na calec cittaṃ bāhyaceṣṭānivartanāt //
SA11sanss06u:144_0: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteś ca cittaṃ calati samīhitād ālambanād anyatra nīyamānatvāt /
SA11sanss06u:147_0: tā bhavanti tadā tadvaśatvād ekasminn ālambane nibaddhaṃ yāvad iṣyate tāvat tiṣṭhati /
SA11sanss06u:149_0: adyatve 'pi ca satvârthakṣamo bhavaty eva prasādakaratvāt /
SA11sanss06u:152_0: āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś câpi jāyate //
SA11sanss06u:153_0: etad eva ca bodhisatvasya kṛtyam yad uta satvâvarjanaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:156_0: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisatvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanenâiva satvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ /
SA11sanss06u:158_0: na bhagavan bodhisatvasyânyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra satvâvarjanāt /
SA11sanss06u:160_0: evaṃ punar akriyamāṇe ko doṣêty āha /
SA11sanss06u:161_0: anādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jinâṅkuraṃ /
SA11sanss06u:164_0: yena câsya paribhavâivam anartho ratnameghe jinenôktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ /
SA11sanss06u:164_1: yenâprasādaḥ satvānāṃ tad yatnena vivarjayed iti /
SA11sanss06u:167_0: yāvad iha bodhisatvo nâsthāne viharati nâkāle /
SA11sanss06u:168_0: nâkālabhāṇī bhavati nâkālajño bhavati nâdeśajño bhavati /
SA11sanss06u:178_0: yaḥ satvān rakṣati sa śīlaṃ rakṣatîti /
SA11sanss06u:179_0: anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha rahoavasthâdiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt /
SA11sanss06u:180_0: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśleṣmapūyâdīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasy arahasi côtsargaṃ na kuryād devamanuṣyacittarakṣârthaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:181_0: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca rahôtsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvânutsiṣṭâhāreṣv adadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhyate //
SA11sanss06u:183_0: na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ kheṭe nikṣiptavyêti /
SA11sanss06u:184_0: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣv eva /
SA11sanss06u:185_0: atra tu sūtre brahmacāry-adhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarâpattibhayasaṃdarśanârthaṃ //
SA11sanss06u:189_0: tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ na ca vadhasadṛśena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti /
SA11sanss06u:190_0: tathā prātimokṣād api lokâprasādakaram anveṣya varjanīyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:193_0: pralambapādaṃ nâsīta na bāhuṃ mardayet samam //
SA11sanss06u:194_0: evaṃ svayam apy utprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokâprasādaṃ rakṣeta /
SA11sanss06u:195_0: aprasādakaravacanavarjanaṃ tu na sukaram iti smaraṇabodhanârtham upadarśyate /
SA11sanss06u:213_0: na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā /
SA11sanss06u:221_0: yêyaṃ vāgamanojñā svasantānaparasantānavināśanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya /
SA11sanss06u:222_0_0: yêyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manâpakaraṇī [[DOUBT]] hitakaraṇī karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā
SA11sanss06u:222_0_1: vijñeyā śravaṇīyâniśritā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanâpā [[DOUBT]] vijñapraśastā sarvasatvahitasukhâvahā manôtplāvakarī
SA11sanss06u:222_0_2: manaḥprahlādanakarī svaparasantānapramodanakarī rāgadveṣamohasarvakleśâpraśāmanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /
SA11sanss06u:223_0: yāvad itihāsapūrvakam api vacanaṃ parihārya pariharatîti //
SA11sanss06u:230_0: na bodhisatvenâiṣā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayâparo vyāpadyeta /
SA11sanss06u:231_0: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayâparaṃ tāpayet /
SA11sanss06u:232_0: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yat paro jānīyāt /
SA11sanss06u:233_0: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayârthā nirarthā /
SA11sanss06u:234_0: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā na vidyām utpādayet /
SA11sanss06u:235_0: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yā satvānāṃ na hṛdayaṃgamā na paurī na karṇasukhā
SA11sanss06u:243_0: asya tu granthavistarasyâyaṃ piṇḍârtho bodhisatvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:247_0: nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam /
SA11sanss06u:255_0: tasmāt piṇḍapātrād ekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati /
SA11sanss06u:256_0: dvitīyaṃ duṣkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturtham ātmanā paribhuṅkte /
SA11sanss06u:266_0: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣâbhimukhena bhavitavyam ity ādi //
SA11sanss06u:268_0: tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:276_0: dāntâjāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāram anutsṛjatā nâmiṣaprakṣiptayā santatyā piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ sâvadānacāriṇā ca bhavitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:277_0: yataś ca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrânunayo na kartavyaḥ yataś ca na labhyate tatra pratighāto*nôtpādayitavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:278_0: daśakulapraveśe na câikādaśāt kulād bhikṣā na labhyate /
SA11sanss06u:279_0: tathâpi na paritaptavyaṃ evaṃ ca cittam utpādayitavyam /
SA11sanss06u:280_0: evaṃ bahukṛtyā hy ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo na tair avaśyaṃ mama dātavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:281_0: idaṃ tāvad āścaryaṃ yan mām ete samanvāharanti /
SA11sanss06u:282_0: kaḥ punar vādo yad bhikṣāṃ dāsyanti /
SA11sanss06u:284_0: ye câsya satvāś cakṣuṣu ābhāsam āgacchanti strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:286_0: tathâhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me satvāś cakṣuṣâbhāsam āgacchanti piṇḍapātaṃ vā dāsyanti tān sugatigāminaḥ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanss06u:288_0: tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā piṇḍapāta saṃgṛhya samantāc caturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:293_0: yadi daridraṃ satvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātāt saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:294_0: atha na kañcit satvaṃ daridraṃ paśyati /
SA11sanss06u:296_0: santy anābhāsagatāḥ satvā ye mama cakṣuṣu ābhāsaṃ nâgacchanti /
SA11sanss06u:299_0: tena tat piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tad araṇyâyatanam abhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa śramaṇacāritrakalpa-
SA11sanss06u:306_0: bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi /
SA11sanss06u:307_0: yadi punar asya lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhavati tenâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:308_0: lūhâhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣamôccāraprasrāvaniṣyandanaś ca me parītto bhaviṣyati /
SA11sanss06u:312_0: yadā punar asya prabhūtaḥ piṇḍapāto bhavati tatrâpi mātrâbhojinā bhavitavyaṃ utsarjanadharmiṇā ca /
SA11sanss06u:313_0: tataḥ piṇḍapātād anyatarāyāṃ śilāyām avatīryâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:314_0: ye kecin mṛgapakṣisaṃgâmiṣabhojanenârthikās te dattâdānāḥ paribhuñjatām iti //
SA11sanss06u:327_0: tena nâivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ /puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dad-ti na strīḥ /
SA11sanss06u:328_0: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:329_0: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā /
SA11sanss06u:330_0: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:333_0: capalaṃ labhe 'haṃ na kṛcchreṇa praviṣṭamātraṃ ca māṃ samanvāhareyuḥ /
SA11sanss06u:338_0: na hīnadaridrabhojanaṃ labhe 'haṃ pratyudgaccheyur māṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ /
SA11sanss06u:341_0: prāyeṇa hi satvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣûpapadyante /
SA11sanss06u:342_0: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭâgṛddhâlulopā rasapratiprasrabdhā jihvêndriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenâpi bhojanena jñāpayanti /
SA11sanss06u:346_0: evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā nidhyaptacittena suparipakvān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam /
SA11sanss06u:350_0: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣur meghâkulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śaknuyāt piṇḍāyâvatartuṃ /
SA11sanss06u:351_0: tena maitryâhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchadacchinnenâivaṃ saṃjñôtpādayitavyā /
SA11sanss06u:352_0: santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena kheṭapiṇḍam apy āhāraṃ na pratilabhante /
SA11sanss06u:353_0: tan mayā dharmayoniśaś cintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurbalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā nôtpādayitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:359_0: ciṃ kārayet tatra kule āsane niṣadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā /
SA11sanss06u:360_0: yāvan na sa piṇḍapātaḥ śucīkrṭo bhavet tena piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā utthāyâsanāt prakramitavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:363_0: nâvabhāsakareṇa bhavitavyaṃ na lapanā na kuhanā kartavyā //
SA11sanss06u:366_0: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapātâsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:371_0: sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:373_0: yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vâśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenâśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena /
SA11sanss06u:376_0: yasyāś cântike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cârthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti /
SA11sanss06u:381_0: māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpâtmāno bodhisatvasyêti vadāmi //
SA11sanss06u:385_0: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca /
SA11sanss06u:386_0: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ câiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet //
SA11sanss06u:387_0: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet /
SA11sanss06u:388_0: chidrâchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam //
SA11sanss06u:390_0: lābhârthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsârthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:393_0: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ /
SA11sanss06u:395_0: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpaka-riṇaḥ /
SA11sanss06u:398_0: acoditaṃ ca nâivâsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet //
SA11sanss06u:399_0: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:411_0: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ /
SA11sanss06u:413_0: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante 'tha vā yogināṃ kule /
SA11sanss06u:423_0: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret //
SA11sanss06u:426_0: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ /
SA11sanss06u:427_1: /yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahârthasādhakatvān nirdoṣam /
SA11sanss06u:434_0: tenâsmin na maitrī śaṅkâpi nâstîty adoṣaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:439_0: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇântarāyêti /
SA11sanss06u:443_0: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena /
SA11sanss06u:445_0: tatrôddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānîti //
SA11sanss06u:448_0: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmârthaṃ brahmacaryavāsârthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya /
SA11sanss06u:450_0: kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cêdṛśī kṣaṇapratilābhôtsavasampad /
SA11sanss06u:451_0: iti tatpradarśanârthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyôpayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ //
SA11sanss06u:453_0: tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyôpastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ /

SA11sanss06u:502_0: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogâcārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite /

SA11sanss06u:508_0: sādhu sādhu kulaputrâivaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokâvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate /
SA11sanss06u:513_0: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogâcāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī /
SA11sanss06u:514_0: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv anātmâdhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇâbhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta /
SA11sanss06u:516_0: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ
SA11sanss06u:521_0: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yêyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ /
SA11sanss06u:522_0_0: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyâpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas
SA11sanss06u:523_0: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣayêti /
SA11sanss06u:524_0: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanârambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakânugrahe /
